publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4089 Mark Ballard: Scottish Hunt Crimewatch—That the Parliament welcomes the Scottish Hunt Crimewatch, launched by the League Against Cruel Sports, Advocates for Animals and International Fund for Animal Welfare; notes their concern that some Scottish hunts may be breaking the law; welcomes the project’s plan to pass on any evidence of illegal hunting to the police, and acknowledges the benefit of this campaign to the welfare of wild animals in Scotland. R

S2M-4089 Mark Ballard: Scottish Hunt Crimewatch—That the Parliament welcomes the Scottish Hunt Crimewatch, launched by the League Against Cruel Sports, Advocates for Animals and International Fund for Animal Welfare; notes their concern that some Scottish hunts may be breaking the law; welcomes the project’s plan to pass on any evidence of illegal hunting to the police, and acknowledges the benefit of this campaign to the welfare of wild animals in Scotland. R
S2M-4089 Scottish Hunt Crimewatch (lodged on 8 March 2006) Carolyn Leckie*, Frances Curran*, Michael Matheson* Contents An A B C D E F G H I J
S2M-4089 Scottish Hunt Crimewatch (lodged on 8 March 2006) Linda Fabiani*, Irene Oldfather*
S2M-4089 Scottish Hunt Crimewatch (lodged on 8 March 2006) Robin Harper*
